summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6441 for the improvement of a portion of THE ALLEY IN BLOCK "D", PLAT OF THE 4th ADDITION AS LAID OFF BY WILLIAM N. BELL, being that portion of the alley between Western Avenue and 1st Avenue from Eagle Street to approximately 180 feet southeasterly thereof; by paving and otherwise improving the same;
